testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to register page............................................passed When user selects the gender type...........................................passed And user enters first name "automation" and last name "tester"..............passed And user enters date of birth...............................................passed And user enters email "test@example.com" field..............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd"...................................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then A success message will be displayed....................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed When user logs in with "valid" "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"............passed And user presses on the login button........................................passed Then user logs in to the system successfully................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user can't login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed When user logs in with "invalid" "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"..........passed And user presses on the login button........................................passed Then user can not login to the system.......................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | users can change the system currency
testcase.name: users can change the system currency successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user selects Euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page.passed Then Euro Symbol € is shown on the 4 displayed products the in Home page....passed

testcase.classname: F04_search |user could search using product name and sku
testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: When user types "book" in the search field and clicks search button.........passed Then The search result for search with "book" will be displayed.............passed

testcase.system-out: When user types "laptop" in the search field and clicks search button.......passed Then The search result for search with "laptop" will be displayed...........passed

testcase.system-out: When user types "nike" in the search field and clicks search button.........passed Then The search result for search with "nike" will be displayed.............passed

testcase.system-out: When user types "SCI_FAITH" in the search field and clicks search button....passed Then The search result for searching with "SCI_FAITH" will be displayed.....passed

testcase.classname: F05_SelectDifferentCategories |user can select different Categories
testcase.name: user can select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given user hovers on "Computers" on the top menu,The related sub menu will be opened and one of it's items will be selected.passed

testcase.classname: F05_SelectDifferentCategories |user can select different Categories
testcase.name: user can select different Categories 2
testcase.system-out: Given user hovers on "Electronics" on the top menu,The related sub menu will be opened and one of it's items will be selected.passed

testcase.classname: F06_AddToWishList |user can add different products to Wishlist
testcase.name: 1-user can add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on add to wish list button of HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop from the home screen.passed Then A message that the product was added to the wish list successfully will be displayed.passed

testcase.classname: F06_AddToWishList |user can add different products to Wishlist
testcase.name: 2-user can add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given user searches for a "HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop" from the home screen.passed Then The search result for search will be displayed.........................passed And The user clicks on the first item to be in the product details page.....passed And The user clicks on add to wishList button...............................passed Then The name of the "HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop" will be added to the wishlist with a quantity more than zero.passed

testcase.classname: F07_AddToCompare |user can add two products to compare them
testcase.name: user can add two products to compare them
testcase.system-out: When user types "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" in the search field and clicks search button.passed Then The search result appears and the user selects one of the search results.passed And The user clicks on addToCompare button..................................passed Then user types "Build your own computer" in the search field and clicks search button.passed Then The search result appears and the user selects one of the search results.passed And The user clicks on addToCompare button..................................passed Then The user navigates to the compare page to compare between the two added products.passed

testcase.classname: F07_Slider |Navigation after clicking on Slider images.
testcase.name: The page should be navigated after clicking on the first image in the slider.

failure.message: Wrong direction! Bug Dedected! expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/]

testcase.failure:
Given The user clicks on the first image on the slider......................passed Then The page should be navigated to the expected URL "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020".failed
